sql: SELECT r.id "id", r.regdate "regdate", r.checkin_time "checkin_time", u.id "id", u.username "username", u.password "password", u.name "name", u.authorities "authorities", u.regdate "regdate", u.car_name "car_name", u.car_number "car_number", u.phone_number "phone_number" FROM t404_reserve r, t404_user u WHERE r.user_id = u.id
